source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 669,024 damage to your primary target and 130,844 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 14,189 for 15 sec.
Use: Channel to store 50,429 mana in the Ingenious Mana Battery, up to a max of 201,715. (1 Min Cooldown)

Equip: While your mana is above 50%, gain 939 Versatility, increased by up to 100% by the mana stored in the battery. While your mana is under 50%, siphon 50,429 mana every 5 sec from the Ingenious Mana Battery into your mana pool.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Personal Tabard
description: Visit Personal Tabard Designers in Stormwind, Orgrimmar, or Valdrakken to change your personal tabard design.
